title: Tasks Phase: automated-production-release - Ready for Review
response:
Feedback Summary (1 comments):

General Comments:
1. Follow git workflow. Each task should include a step to commit to git with helpful message. First task should create a feature branch and commit spec files. Last task should create PR and fix any CI build issues.
